name: Green Planet
description:
GAMETIME: 10 MINUTES

Land your spaceship on a promising Earth-like planet untouched by man and exploit its resources in an act of greed in this short story about climate change. Cage up chickens, destroy habitats by drilling into the ground, and fill the air with smog all in the name of profit. And I hear this planet as a particularly valuable core...

CONTROLS:

MOVEWASD/ARROW KEYSJUMPW, UP ARROW, OR SPACEBUILD MODEBADVANCE NARRATORENTERPLACELEFT CLICKREMOVERIGHT CLICKSELECT BUILDINGNUM KEYSREPAIRR

CREDITS:

- Programmed by Daniel Elwell and Sumanta Das

- Art done by Daniel Elwell

- The song used in the intro and outro is Mozart's Symphony no. 40 in G minor

DEVELOPMENT:

- Developed using C++ and SDL2

- Art made in Aseprite

-This is our first game ever made, so we are still learning and would love any feedback! Thanks for playing!
